content: lion brand pattern # w80013 *ckc-brightplacemats pdf* skill level beginner lion® cotton article #760 4 colors 1 ball each crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm placemats are worked in single_crochet u s in color stripes pattern makes four placemats one in each of four different colorways pattern includes color photos showing how to attach the fringe see ravelry bright placemats knit 1 for the knit version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/bright-placemats-knit
